title: Richard Sherman Interview, Week 13 Picks (Football 12/1)
description:
Will Brinson, Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora are back for the Week 13 picks pod, featuring an interview with Seahawks CB Richard Sherman. First, Will and Jason get into JLC's newly-named "Lock of the Week" (:33). Then, Richard Sherman joins Will to discuss his injury, the Legion of Boom, and social activism in the NFL (11:20). Will is next joined by Nick and Pete to go through their Week 13 picks against the spread, highlighted by top matchups between the Falcons-Vikings, Saints-Painters, and Eagles-Seahawks (23:38).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
